assumptions_made.description: MasterPipeline uses the Priority 1 queue in BackpressureValve for the main loop so that VisionExtractor (Priority 3) never starves the main processing loop when Node.js is saturated.
RunnerV6 forces CSV encoding validation on startup to definitively eliminate the SERPER-1 string pollution error before records even hit the pipeline.

innovations_proposed.description: StopTheBleedingController aggregates browser crash reports and Backpressure metrics. If concurrency is forcibly locked at 1 for too long, it triggers BLEEDING mode to save API costs because the system is deemed 'clogged'.
innovations_proposed.benefit: Prevents runaway credit billing when the network or Hetzner server is artificially constricted.
